header-info: Can you find the shortest route?
project-desc: As my first application for the Vida Science Center, I created this game. The goal is to travel through all the cities on the map in the shortest possible route.
project-desc-two: This project also included another program written in Python that calculated the shortest distance. I have to thank Chat GPT for this program. ðŸ˜€
project-desc-three: The application is designed for a resolution of 1920x1080 and is not responsive. The web version may have a few issues, such as incorrect font loading. In the future, I plan to add installation files so that anyone can install and try it out.
